              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">expand 
      our systems effectively or efficiently or in a timely 
    manner;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">allocate 
      our human resources optimally;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">identify 
      and hire qualified employees or retain valued employees; 
  or</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">incorporate 
      effectively the components of any business that we may acquire in our 
      effort to achieve growth.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If we are 
unable to manage our growth, our operations and our financial results could be 
adversely affected by inefficiency, which could diminish our 
profitability.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
hedging activities could result in financial losses or could reduce our net 
income, which may adversely affect your investment in our common 
stock.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
current credit facility with CIT Capital USA, Inc. imposes specific hedging 
requirements for our future production.&#160;&#160;At the current time, we have 
hedged approximately 20% of our expected 2009 production and less than 5% of our 
2010 and 2011 production.&#160;&#160;While intended to reduce the effects of 
volatile oil and natural gas prices, such transactions may limit our potential 
gains and increase our potential losses if oil and natural gas prices were to 
rise substantially over the price established by the hedge.&#160;&#160;In 
addition, such transactions may expose us to the risk of loss in certain 
circumstances, including instances in which:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">our 
      production is less than expected;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">there 
      is a widening of price differentials between delivery points for our 
      production and the delivery point assumed in the hedge arrangement; 
      or</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      counterparties to our hedging agreements fail to perform under the 
      contracts.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Risks 
Related To Our Industry</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Oil 
and natural gas prices are very volatile.&#160;&#160;A protracted period of oil 
and natural gas prices similar to or below the prices in effect at December 31, 
2008 may adversely affect our business, financial condition, results of 
operations or cash flows.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The oil 
and gas markets are very volatile, and we cannot predict future oil and natural 
gas prices.&#160;&#160;The price we receive for our oil and natural gas 
production heavily influences our revenue, profitability, access to capital and 
future rate of growth.&#160;&#160;The prices we receive for our production and 
the levels of our production depend on numerous factors beyond our 
control.&#160;&#160;These factors include, but are not limited to, the 
following:<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 1pt">&#160;</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">changes 
      in global supply and demand for oil and 
gas;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      actions of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting 
    Countries;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      price and quantity of imports of foreign oil and 
  gas;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">political 
      and economic conditions, including embargoes, in oil-producing countries 
      or affecting other oil-producing 
activity;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      level of global oil and gas exploration and production 
      activity;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      level of global oil and gas 
inventories;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">weather 
      conditions;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">technological 
      advances affecting energy 
consumption;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">domestic 
      and foreign governmental 
regulations;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">12</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">proximity 
      and capacity of oil and gas pipelines and other transportation 
      facilities;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      price and availability of competitors&#8217; supplies of oil and gas in captive 
      market areas;&#160;and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      price and availability of alternative 
fuels.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Furthermore, 
the recent worldwide financial and credit crisis has reduced the availability of 
liquidity and credit to fund the continuation and expansion of industrial 
business operations worldwide. &#160;The shortage of liquidity and credit 
combined with recent substantial losses in worldwide equity markets has lead to 
a worldwide economic recession. &#160;The slowdown in economic activity caused 
by such recession has reduced worldwide demand for energy and resulted in lower 
oil and natural gas prices.&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Lower oil 
and natural gas prices may not only decrease our revenues on a per unit basis 
but also may reduce the amount of oil and natural gas that we can produce 
economically and therefore potentially lower our reserve bookings. &#160;A 
substantial or extended decline in oil or natural gas prices may result in 
impairments of our proved oil and gas properties and may materially and 
adversely affect our future business, financial condition, results of 
operations, liquidity or ability to finance planned capital expenditures. 
&#160;To the extent commodity prices received from production are insufficient 
to fund planned capital expenditures, we will be required to reduce spending or 
borrow any such shortfall. &#160;Lower oil and natural gas prices may also 
reduce the amount of our borrowing base under our credit agreement, which is 
determined at the discretion of the lenders based on the collateral value of our 
proved&#160;reserves that have been mortgaged to the lenders, and is subject to 
regular redeterminations, as well as special redeterminations described in the 
credit agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Drilling 
for and producing oil and natural gas are high risk activities with many 
uncertainties that could adversely affect our business, financial condition or 
results of operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
future success will depend on the success of our development, exploitation, 
production and exploration activities. &#160;Our oil and natural gas exploration 
and production activities are subject to numerous risks beyond our control, 
including the risk that drilling will not result in commercially viable oil or 
natural gas production. &#160;Our decisions to purchase, explore, develop or 
otherwise exploit prospects or properties will depend in part on the evaluation 
of data obtained through geophysical and geological analyses, production data 
and engineering studies, the results of which are often inconclusive or subject 
to varying interpretations. &#160;Our cost of drilling, completing and operating 
wells is often uncertain before drilling commences. &#160;Overruns in budgeted 
expenditures are common risks that can make a particular project uneconomical. 
&#160;Further, many factors may curtail, delay or cancel drilling, including the 
following:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#8226;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="69%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">delays 
      imposed by or resulting from compliance with regulatory 
      requirements;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#8226;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="69%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">pressure 
      or irregularities in geological formations;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#8226;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="69%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">shortages 
      of or delays in obtaining qualified personnel or equipment, including 
      drilling rigs and CO<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: sub">2</font>;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#8226;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="69%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">equipment 
      failures or accidents; and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="5%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#8226;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="69%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">adverse 
      weather conditions, such as freezing temperatures, hurricanes and 
      storms.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
exploration for oil and gas is risky and may not be commercially successful, and 
the advanced technologies we use cannot eliminate exploration risk, which could 
impair our ability to generate revenues from our operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
future success will depend on the success of our exploratory drilling 
program.&#160;&#160;Oil and gas exploration involves a high degree of 
risk.&#160;&#160;These risks are more acute in the early stages of 
exploration.&#160;&#160;Our ability to produce revenue and our resulting 
financial performance are significantly affected by the prices we receive for 
oil and natural gas produced from wells on our acreage.&#160;&#160;Especially in 
recent years, the prices at which oil and natural gas trade in the open market 
have experienced significant volatility, and will likely continue to fluctuate 
in the foreseeable future due to a variety of influences including, but not 
limited to, the following:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">domestic 
      and foreign demand for oil and natural gas by both refineries and end 
      users;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the 
      introduction of alternative forms of fuel to replace or compete with oil 
      and natural gas;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">domestic 
      and foreign reserves and supply of oil and natural 
  gas;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">competitive 
      measures implemented by our competitors and domestic and foreign 
      governmental bodies;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">13</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">political 
      climates in nations that traditionally produce and export significant 
      quantities of oil and natural gas (including military and other conflicts 
      in the Middle East and surrounding geographic region) and regulations and 
      tariffs imposed by exporting and importing 
  nations;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">weather 
      conditions; and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">domestic 
      and foreign economic volatility and 
stability.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
expenditures on exploration may not result in new discoveries of oil or natural 
gas in commercially viable quantities.&#160;&#160;It is difficult to project the 
costs of implementing an exploratory drilling program due to the inherent 
uncertainties of drilling in unknown formations, the costs associated with 
encountering various drilling conditions, such as over-pressured zones and tools 
lost in the hole, and changes in drilling plans and locations as a result of 
prior exploratory wells or additional seismic data and interpretations 
thereof.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Even when 
used and properly interpreted, three-dimensional (3-D) seismic data and 
visualization techniques only assist geoscientists in identifying subsurface 
structures and hydrocarbon indicators.&#160;&#160;They do not allow the 
interpreter to know conclusively if hydrocarbons are present or economically 
producible.&#160;&#160;In addition, the use of three-dimensional (3-D) seismic 
data becomes less reliable when used at increasing depths.&#160;&#160;We could 
incur losses as a result of expenditures on unsuccessful wells.&#160;&#160;If 
exploration costs exceed our estimates, or if our exploration efforts do not 
produce results which meet our expectations, our exploration efforts may not be 
commercially successful, which could adversely impact our ability to generate 
revenues from our operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We 
may not be able to develop oil and gas reserves on an economically viable basis, 
and our reserves and production may decline as a result.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If we 
succeed in discovering oil and/or natural gas reserves, we cannot assure that 
these reserves will be capable of production levels we project or in sufficient 
quantities to be commercially viable.&#160;&#160;On a long-term basis, our 
viability depends on our ability to find or acquire, develop and commercially 
produce additional oil and natural gas reserves.&#160;&#160;Without the addition 
of reserves through acquisition, exploration or development activities, our 
reserves and production will decline over time as reserves are 
produced.&#160;&#160;Our future reserves will depend not only on our ability to 
develop then-existing properties, but also on our ability to identify and 
acquire additional suitable producing properties or prospects, to find markets 
for the oil and natural gas we develop and to effectively distribute our 
production into our markets.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Future 
oil and gas exploration may involve unprofitable efforts, not only from dry 
wells, but from wells that are productive but do not produce sufficient net 
revenues to return a profit after drilling, operating and other 
costs.&#160;&#160;Completion of a well does not assure a profit on the 
investment or recovery of drilling, completion and operating 
costs.&#160;&#160;In addition, drilling hazards or environmental damage could 
greatly increase the cost of operations, and various field operating conditions 
may adversely affect the production from successful wells.&#160;&#160;These 
conditions include delays in obtaining governmental approvals or consents, 
shut-downs of connected wells resulting from extreme weather conditions, 
problems in storage and distribution and adverse geological and mechanical 
conditions.&#160;&#160;While we will endeavor to effectively manage these 
conditions, we cannot be assured of doing so optimally, and we will not be able 
to eliminate them completely in any case.&#160;&#160;Therefore, these conditions 
could diminish our revenue and cash flow levels and result in the impairment of 
our oil and natural gas interests.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Estimates 
of oil and natural gas reserves that we make may be inaccurate and our actual 
revenues may be lower than our financial projections.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We will 
make estimates of oil and natural gas reserves, upon which we will base our 
financial projections.&#160;&#160;We will make these reserve estimates using 
various assumptions, including assumptions as to oil and natural gas prices, 
drilling and operating expenses, capital expenditures, taxes and availability of 
funds.&#160;&#160;Some of these assumptions are inherently subjective, and the 
accuracy of our reserve estimates relies in part on the ability of our 
management team, engineers and other advisors to make accurate 
assumptions.&#160;&#160;Economic factors beyond our control, such as interest 
rates, will also impact the value of our reserves.&#160;&#160;The process of 
estimating oil and natural gas reserves is complex, and will require us to use 
significant decisions and assumptions in the evaluation of available geological, 
geophysical, engineering and economic data for each property.&#160;&#160;As a 
result, our reserve estimates will be inherently imprecise.&#160;&#160;Actual 
future production, oil and natural gas prices, revenues, taxes, development 
expenditures, operating expenses and quantities of recoverable oil and natural 
gas reserves may vary</font></div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">14</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">substantially 
from those we estimate.&#160;&#160;If actual production results vary 
substantially from our reserve estimates, this could materially reduce our 
revenues and result in the impairment of our oil and natural gas 
interests.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Drilling 
new wells could result in new liabilities, which could endanger our interests in 
our properties and assets.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">There are 
risks associated with the drilling of oil and natural gas wells, including 
encountering unexpected formations or pressures, premature declines of 
reservoirs, blow-outs, craterings, sour gas releases, fires and spills, among 
others.&#160;&#160;The occurrence of any of these events could significantly 
reduce our revenues or cause substantial losses, impairing our future operating 
results.&#160;&#160;We may become subject to liability for pollution, blow-outs 
or other hazards.&#160;&#160;We intend to obtain insurance with respect to these 
hazards; however, such insurance has limitations on liability that may not be 
sufficient to cover the full extent of such liabilities.&#160;&#160;The payment 
of such liabilities could reduce the funds available to us or could, in an 
extreme case, result in a total loss of our properties and 
assets.&#160;&#160;Moreover, we may not be able to maintain adequate insurance 
in the future at rates that are considered reasonable.&#160;&#160;Oil and 
natural gas production operations are also subject to all the risks typically 
associated with such operations, including premature decline of reservoirs and 
the invasion of water into producing formations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Decommissioning 
costs are unknown and may be substantial.&#160;&#160;Unplanned costs could 
divert resources from other projects.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We may 
become responsible for costs associated with abandoning and reclaiming wells, 
facilities and pipelines which we use for production of oil and natural gas 
reserves.&#160;&#160;Abandonment and reclamation of these facilities and the 
costs associated therewith is often referred to as 
&#8220;decommissioning.&#8221;&#160;&#160;We have not yet determined whether we will 
establish a cash reserve account for these potential costs in respect of any of 
our properties or facilities, or if we will satisfy such costs of 
decommissioning from the proceeds of production in accordance with the practice 
generally employed in oilfield operations.&#160;&#160;If decommissioning is 
required before economic depletion of our properties or if our estimates of the 
costs of decommissioning exceed the value of the reserves remaining at any 
particular time to cover such decommissioning costs, we may have to draw on 
funds from other sources to satisfy such costs.&#160;&#160;The use of other 
funds to satisfy such decommissioning costs could impair our ability to focus 
capital investment in other areas of our business.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We 
may have difficulty distributing our production, which could harm our financial 
condition.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In order 
to sell the oil and natural gas that we are able to produce, we may have to make 
arrangements for storage and distribution to the market.&#160;&#160;We will rely 
on local infrastructure and the availability of transportation for storage and 
shipment of our products, but infrastructure development and storage and 
transportation facilities may be insufficient for our needs at commercially 
acceptable terms in the localities in which we operate.&#160;&#160;This could be 
particularly problematic to the extent that our operations are conducted in 
remote areas that are difficult to access, such as areas that are distant from 
shipping and/or pipeline facilities.&#160;&#160;These factors may affect our 
ability to explore and develop properties and to store and transport our oil and 
natural gas production and may increase our expenses.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Furthermore, 
weather conditions or natural disasters, actions by companies doing business in 
one or more of the areas in which we will operate, or labor disputes may impair 
the distribution of oil and/or natural gas and in turn diminish our financial 
condition or ability to maintain our operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Environmental 
risks may adversely affect our business.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">All 
phases of the oil and gas business present environmental risks and hazards and 
are subject to environmental regulation pursuant to a variety of federal, state 
and municipal laws and regulations.&#160;&#160;Environmental legislation 
provides for, among other things, restrictions and prohibitions on spills, 
releases or emissions of various substances produced in association with oil and 
gas operations.&#160;&#160;The legislation also requires that wells and facility 
sites be operated, maintained, abandoned and reclaimed to the satisfaction of 
applicable regulatory authorities.&#160;&#160;Compliance with such legislation 
can require significant expenditures and a breach may result in the imposition 
of fines and penalties, some of which may be material.&#160;&#160;Environmental 
legislation is evolving in a manner we expect may result in stricter standards 
and enforcement, larger fines and liability and potentially increased capital 
expenditures and operating costs.&#160;&#160;The discharge of oil, natural gas 
or other pollutants into the air, soil or water may give rise to liabilities to 
governments and third parties and may require us to incur costs to remedy such 
discharge.</font></div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">15</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
application of environmental laws to our business may cause us to curtail our 
production or increase the costs of our production, development or exploration 
activities.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
business will suffer if we cannot obtain or maintain necessary 
licenses.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
operations will require licenses, permits and in some cases renewals of licenses 
and permits from various governmental authorities.&#160;&#160;Our ability to 
obtain, sustain or renew such licenses and permits on acceptable terms is 
subject to change in regulations and policies and to the discretion of the 
applicable governments, among other factors.&#160;&#160;Our inability to obtain, 
or our loss of or denial of extension of, any of these licenses or permits could 
hamper our ability to produce revenues from our operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Challenges 
to our properties may impact our financial condition.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Title to 
oil and gas interests is often not capable of conclusive determination without 
incurring substantial expense.&#160;&#160;While we intend to make appropriate 
inquiries into the title of properties and other development rights we acquire, 
title defects may exist.&#160;&#160;In addition, we may be unable to obtain 
adequate insurance for title defects, on a commercially reasonable basis or at 
all.&#160;&#160;If title defects do exist, it is possible that we may lose all 
or a portion of our right, title and interests in and to the properties to which 
the title defects relate.&#160;&#160;If our property rights are reduced, our 
ability to conduct our exploration, development and production activities may be 
impaired. To mitigate tile problems it is common industry practice to obtain a 
Title Opinion from a qualified oil and gas attorney prior to the drilling 
operations of a well.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We 
will rely on technology to conduct our business and our technology could become 
ineffective or obsolete.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We rely 
on technology, including geographic and seismic analysis techniques and economic 
models, to develop our reserve estimates and to guide our exploration, 
development and production activities.&#160;&#160;We will be required to 
continually enhance and update our technology to maintain its efficacy and to 
avoid obsolescence.&#160;&#160;The costs of doing so may be substantial, and may 
be higher than the costs that we anticipate for technology maintenance and 
development.&#160;&#160;If we are unable to maintain the efficacy of our 
technology, our ability to manage our business and to compete may be 
impaired.&#160;&#160;Further, even if we are able to maintain technical 
effectiveness, our technology may not be the most efficient means of reaching 
our objectives, in which case we may incur higher operating costs than we would 
were our technology more efficient.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Risks 
Related to our Common Stock</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
market price of our common stock is, and is likely to continue to be, highly 
volatile and subject to wide fluctuations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
market price of our common stock is likely to continue to be highly volatile and 
could be subject to wide fluctuations in response to a number of factors, some 
of which are beyond our control, including:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">dilution 
      caused by our issuance of additional shares of common stock and other 
      forms of equity securities, which we expect to make in connection with 
      future capital financings to fund our operations and growth, to attract 
      and retain valuable personnel and in connection with future strategic 
      partnerships with other companies;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">

                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">announcements 
      of new acquisitions, reserve discoveries or other business initiatives by 
      our competitors;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">

              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">our

      other business initiatives;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">

              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">fluctuations 
      in revenue from our oil and gas business as new reserves come to 
      market;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">

              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">

              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">changes 
      in the market for oil and natural gas commodities and/or in the capital 
      markets generally;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">

              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">

              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">changes 
      in the demand for oil and natural gas, including changes resulting from 
      the introduction or expansion of alternative 
  fuels;</font></div>
              </td>

      <div>

      variations in our revenues and operating 
  expenses;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>

      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">

              <td>

      in other industries;</font></div>

      industry;</font></div>
              </td>

      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">

      industry;</font></div>
              </td>

      </div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">16</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">additions 
      and departures of key personnel;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">announcements 
      of technological innovations or new products available to the oil and gas 
      industry;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">announcements 
      by relevant governments pertaining to incentives for alternative energy 
      development programs;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">fluctuations 
      in interest rates and the availability of capital in the capital markets; 
      and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">significant 
      sales of our common stock, including sales by selling stockholders 
      following the registration of shares under a 
  prospectus.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">These and 
other factors are largely beyond our control, and the impact of these risks, 
singly or in the aggregate, may result in material adverse changes to the market 
price of our common stock and/or our results of operations and financial 
condition.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
operating results may fluctuate significantly, and these fluctuations may cause 
the price of our common stock to decline.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
operating results will likely vary in the future primarily as the result of 
fluctuations in our revenues and operating expenses, including the coming to 
market of oil and natural gas reserves that we are able to discover and develop, 
expenses that we incur, the prices of oil and natural gas in the commodities 
markets and other factors.&#160;&#160;If our results of operations do not meet 
the expectations of current or potential investors, the price of our common 
stock may decline.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Stockholders 
will experience dilution upon the exercise of options.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As of 
December 31, 2008, we had authorized the issuance of up to 2,000,000 shares of 
common stock underlying options that may be granted, of which options for 
1,660,000 shares of common stock had already been granted, and of those granted, 
400,000 remain outstanding, pursuant to our 2006 Incentive Stock Option 
Plan.&#160;&#160;On January 30, 2009, our Board of Directors also adopted the 
2009 Equity Incentive Plan, pursuant to which we may issue up to 3,000,000 
shares of our common stock either upon exercise of stock options granted under 
such plan or through restricted stock awards under such plan.&#160;&#160;If the 
holders of outstanding options exercise those options or our Compensation 
Committee determines to grant restricted stock awards under our incentive plan, 
stockholders may experience dilution in the net tangible book value of our 
common stock.&#160;&#160;Further, the sale or availability for sale of the 
underlying shares in the marketplace could depress our stock price.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We 
do not expect to pay dividends in the foreseeable future.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We do not 
intend to declare dividends for the foreseeable future, as we anticipate that we 
will reinvest any future earnings in the development and growth of our 
business.&#160;&#160;Therefore, investors will not receive any funds unless they 
sell their common stock, and stockholders may be unable to sell their shares on 
favorable terms or at all.&#160;&#160;Investors cannot be assured of a positive 
return on investment or that they will not lose the entire amount of their 
investment in our common stock.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><a name="FIS_FORWARD_LOOK"><br></a></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item 
1B. <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Un</font><a name="1b"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">resol</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">ved Staff 
Comments</font></a></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">None.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div><br>

2.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Properties</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Leasehold 
Properties</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our

northern United States and Yates County, New York, and included the following 
primary positions as of December 31, 2008:</font></div>

              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">A</font>pproximately <font style="DISPLAY: inline">30,000</font> net acres located in Mountrail

                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Approximately 22,000 net acres</font> located in

      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Approximately 10,000 net acres located in the 
      &#8220;Finger Lakes&#8221; region of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Yates
