      River, Marcellus and Q</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">ueenstown-Medina 
  formations</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Approximately 5,000 net acres </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">located in McKenzie, Williams and Mercer Counties 
      North Dakota, in which we are targeting the Bakken 
      Shale.</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">These 
properties target the same Bakken Shale resource formation.&#160;&#160;We 
believe the Bakken formation represents one of the most oil rich, exciting plays 
in the Continental United States.&#160;&#160;The North Dakota Geological Survey 
currently estimates the reserves in the Bakken formation to be 300 billion 
barrels, of which approximately 50% is thought to be currently recoverable, 
making it one of the largest resource plays in the Continental United 
States.&#160;&#160;W<font style="DISPLAY: inline">e possess three-dimensional 
(3-D) seismic data covering our acreage in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Montana</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline"> and 
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">North Dakota</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">, which we hope to utilize to effectively target the 
most effective well locations on our acreage to most efficiently develop our 
properties. </font>We commenced drilling on the Bakken properties in late 
2007.&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on 640-acre spacing, our current acreage position 
would allow us to participate in up to 110 net wells.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In 
addition, we control approximately <font style="DISPLAY: inline">10,000 net 
acres located in the &#8220;Finger Lakes&#8221; region of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Yates County</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">, 
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">New York</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">, in which we are targeting natural gas production from 
the Trenton/Black River, Marcellus and Queenstown-Medina 
formations.&#160;&#160;</font>We possess two-dimension (2-D) seismic data 
veering this position.&#160;&#160;Two wells were recently drilled by Chesapeake 
Energy proximal to our acreage.&#160;&#160;We understand the results of these 
wells to be positive and bode well for the future potential of our 
acreage.&#160;&#160;This property is outside of our core focus area and is 
subject to divestiture although no assurances can be given that we could 
complete a transaction.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Acreage 
Acquisitions</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">The 
discussion that follows summarizes our primary recent acquisitions</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline">.&#160;&#160;We have made various additional 
acquisitions of acreage through numerous small transactions pursuant to which we 
purchased oil, gas and mineral leases.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Montana 
Acquisition</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In 
February 2007, we acquired leasehold interests in approximately 22,000 net 
mineral acres in Sheridan County, Montana.&#160;&#160;We paid a combination of 
cash and stock as consideration for such acquisition, including the issuance of 
an aggregate of 400,000 restricted shares of our common 
stock.</font></div><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">North 
Dakota Acquisitions</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">At 
various points in late 2007 and throughout 2008, we acquired leasehold interests 
in approximately 21,498 net mineral acres of land via bulk purchases in the core 
development area of Mountrail County, North Dakota.&#160;&#160;We paid a 
combination of cash and stock as consideration for such acquisitions, including 
the issuance of an aggregate of 633,027 restricted shares of our common 
stock.&#160;&#160;In addition to these major acquisitions we completed a series 
of small transactions pursuant to which we purchased leasehold interests in 
approximately 8,000 net mineral acres in Mountrail County.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On June 
11, 2008, we entered into a purchase agreement pursuant to which we ultimately 
acquired leasehold interests in approximately 23,210 net mineral acres primarily 
in Dunn County, North Dakota.&#160;&#160;We also completed various additional 
acquisitions of oil and gas leasehold interests through numerous small 
transactions with several parties in fiscal years 2007 and 2008.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">At 
various points in 2007 and 2008, we purchased leasehold interests in 
approximately 10,000 net mineral acres in and around Burke and Divide Counties 
of North Dakota for cash consideration.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We have 
also completed other miscellaneous non-material acquisitions in North Dakota, 
and utilized a combination of stock and cash consideration for some of the 
acquisitions.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">New 
York Acquisition</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In 
September 2007, we acquired leasehold interests in approximately 10,000 net 
mineral acres in the Appalachia Basin of New York.&#160;&#160;We paid a 
combination of cash and stock as consideration for such acquisition, including 
the issuance of an aggregate of 275,000 restricted shares of our common 
stock.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Certain 
of the foregoing acquisitions were purchased using the services of, or purchased 
from, parties considered to be related to our company or our Chief Executive 
Officer, Michael L. Reger.&#160;&#160;All transactions involving related parties 
were approved by our Board of Directors or Audit Committee and we obtained 
independent verification of the fairness of consideration paid in each 
transaction.</font></div>
      </div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">18</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Undeveloped 
and Developed Acreage</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
following table summarizes our estimated gross and net developed and undeveloped 
acreage by county at December&#160;31, 2008.&#160;&#160; Net acreage represents 
our percentage ownership of gross acreage.&#160;&#160;The following table does 
not include acreage in which our interest is limited to royalty and overriding 
royalty interests.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>

                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;</font></div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">19</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Production 
History</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
following table presents information about our produced oil and gas volumes 
during the year ended December 31, 2008.&#160;&#160;Comparative information is 
not available for any prior years because as of December 31, 2007 we had only 
two wells that had just begun to produce oil and had not yet received sales or 
payment data from our operating partners or purchasers regarding that 
production.&#160;&#160;As of December 31, 2008, we were selling oil and natural 
gas from a total of 36 gross wells.&#160;&#160;All data presented below is 
derived from accrued revenue and production volumes for the relevant period 
indicated.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>

        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">20</font></div>

      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Depletion 
of oil and natural gas properties</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>Our depletion expense is driven by many 
factors including certain exploration costs involved in the development of 
producing reserves, production levels and estimates of proved reserve quantities 
and future developmental costs. The following table presents our depletion 
expenses for the year ended December 31, 2008.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>

      </font></td>
                <td valign="bottom" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">

      Months Ended March 31, 2008</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

      Months Ended June&#160;30, 2008</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Productive 
Oil Wells</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
following table summarizes gross and net productive oil wells by state at 
December 31, 2008 and 2007.&#160;&#160;A net well represents our percentage 
ownership of a gross well. No wells have been permitted or drilled on any of our 
Yates County, New York acreage.&#160;&#160;The following table does not include 
wells in which our interest is limited to royalty and overriding royalty 
interests.&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
following table also does not include wells which were awaiting completion, in 
the process of completion or awaiting flowback subsequent to fracture 
stimulation.</font><br></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Dry 
Holes</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the 
second quarter of 2007, we participated in the Teigen Trust #9-13 with a 6.25% 
working interest, a well identified, proposed and drilled by Kodiak Oil and Gas, 
Inc.&#160;&#160; The well was intended to target the Mission Canyon formation, 
but produced a dry hole.&#160;&#160;We did not have any dry holes in 
2008.</font></div><br><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Drilling 
Activity</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We are 
engaged in numerous drilling activities on properties presently owned and intend 
to drill or develop other properties acquired in the future.&#160;&#160;The 
following table sets forth our drilling activity for the last three 
years.&#160;&#160;The information should not be considered indicative of future 
performance, nor should it be assumed that there is necessarily any correlation 
between the number of productive wells drilled and quantities of reserves found 
or economic value.&#160;&#160;Productive wells are those that produce commercial 
quantities of hydrocarbons, whether or not they produce a reasonable rate of 
return.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As of 
March 16, 2009 we have total of 65 wells that are either drilling, completing or 
producing, including 46 producing wells and 19 drilling or completing 
wells.&#160;&#160;The following table sets forth wells that have completed 
drilling and are producing oil as of March 16, 2009:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Including 
the wells set forth in the foregoing tables, we estimate that approximately 240 
sections in which we have acreage interests have been included in permits to 
drill wells within North Dakota and Montana.&#160;&#160;We do not know if or 
when applicable operators will chose to commence drilling activities for any 
contemplated well that is not yet drilling.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Brigham 
Exploration Joint Ventures</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On April 
23, 2007 we entered into a joint venture agreement with Brigham Exploration. 
Under the terms of the agreement, we contributed 3,000 net acres of our 
approximately 70,000 net acres located in North Dakota and approximately 22,000 
net acres of our Sheridan County, Montana acreage.&#160;&#160;Commencing in 
2008, Brigham was subject to a 120 day continuous drilling provision requiring 
Brigham to drill every 120 days to retain future drilling opportunities on our 
Sheridan County Acreage.&#160;&#160;Drilling under the Brigham joint venture 
commenced in the early fourth quarter of 2007.&#160;&#160;During 2008, Brigham 
drilled and successfully completed two wells in North Dakota and two wells in 
Montana under the joint venture.&#160;&#160;Subsequent to December 31, 2008, we 
have completed a third Red River producer with Brigham under this Joint 
Venture.</font><br></div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Slawson 
Exploration Drilling Arrangement</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On 
October 30, 2008, we executed a drilling agreement with Slawson Exploration 
covering certain of our acreage in Mountrail County, North Dakota for a single 
well drilling arrangement.&#160;&#160;Under that agreement, we agreed to sell 
120 net acres in Section 5, Township 151 North, Range 92 West for $3,000 per net 
acre.&#160;&#160;Once the transaction was completed, we controlled a 42% working 
interest in the section to be drilled.&#160;&#160;Drilling commenced for the 
Jericho 1-5H well on January 31, 2009, as a horizontal Bakken well drilled on 
the 640 acre spacing unit.&#160;&#160;The Jericho 1-5H was completed in early 
March 2009.&#160;&#160;We expect to utilize this arrangement with Slawson to 
further develop our high working interest sections throughout 
2009.&#160;&#160;We do not, however, anticipate selling down working interest 
but rather drilling units where both Slawson and our company have significant 
leasehold interest.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Research 
and Development</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We do not 
anticipate performing any significant product research and development under our 
plan of operation.</font></div><br>

        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">23</font></div>

            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">

        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Reserves</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>We completed our most recent reservoir 
engineering calculation in February 2009.&#160;&#160;A discussion of our reserve 
estimations and a table summarizing the results of our most recent reserve 
report are included under the heading &#8220;Business &#8211; Reserves&#8221; in Item 1 of this 
report.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Delivery 
Commitments</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>We do not currently have any delivery 
commitments for product obtained from our wells.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item 
3.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Legal 
Proceedings</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As of 
March 16, 2009, our company was a party to one litigation claim arising in the 
ordinary course of business and seeking the quieting of title for a leasehold 
interest acquired from a third party.&#160;&#160;To the knowledge of management, 
no federal, state or local governmental agency is presently contemplating any 
proceeding against the Company.&#160;&#160;No director, executive officer or 
affiliate of the Company or owner of record or beneficially of more than five 
percent of the Company&#8217;s common stock is a party adverse to the Company or has a 
material interest adverse to the Company in any proceeding.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On or 
about December 19, 2008, we instituted a FINRA dispute Resolution matter against 
UBS Financial Services, Inc. (&#8220;UBS&#8221;) relating to certain unauthorized trades 
conducted by UBS in connection with our commodities hedging account at that 
institution.&#160;&#160;The matter relates to what we allege to be UBS&#8217;s 
improper attribution of an unauthorized long trade to our hedging 
account.&#160;&#160;When our management brought the error to UBS&#8217;s attention, 
UBS acknowledged to two members of our management that the contracts were 
erroneously allocated to our account due to an error and explained that the 
mistake would be corrected and that an amended statement would be 
issued.&#160;&#160;Ultimately UBS liquidated the contracts without any 
instruction from our company.&#160;&#160;In addition to this event, UBS 
subsequently admitted that it had committed other errors in trading for our 
hedging account. We are seeking damages from UBS in excess of $870,000, plus 
attorneys&#8217; fees.&#160;&#160;We recently received UBS&#8217;s response to our Statement 
of Claim and the matter currently is in the discovery stage of 
proceedings.&#160;&#160;We are confident that given the facts, and given UBS&#8217;s 
financial ability to do so, we will recover damages in this action.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
management believes that all litigation matters in which we are involved are not 
likely to have a material adverse effect on our financial position, cash flows 
or results of operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Item 4.&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Submission of 
Matters to a Vote of Security Holders</font>&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">No 
matters were submitted to a vote of our stockholders during the fourth fiscal 
quarter of 2007.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><a name="FIS_NAME_AND_TITLE"><br></a></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Executive 
Officers of the Registrant</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Pursuant 
to Instruction 3 to Item 401(b) of Regulation S-K and General Instruction G(3) 
to Form 10-K, the following information is included in Part I of this annual 
report.&#160;&#160;The following are our executive officers&#160;as of March 16, 
2009.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Name</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td valign="top" width="7%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Age</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="47%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Positions</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="20%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Michael 
      L. Reger</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td valign="top" width="7%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">32</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="47%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Chairman, 
      Chief Executive Officer and Secretary</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="20%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ryan 
      R. Gilbertson</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td valign="top" width="7%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">33</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160; 
      </font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="47%">      
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Director 
      and Chief Financial Officer</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Michael L. Reger </font>has served 
as our Chief Executive Officer, Secretary and a Director since March 
2007.&#160;&#160;Mr. Reger has been primarily involved in the acquisition of 
oil, gas and mineral rights for his entire professional life and is a director 
of Reger Oil based in Billings, Montana.&#160; Mr. Reger holds a Bachelor of 
Arts in Finance and an MBA in Finance/Management from the University of St. 
Thomas in St. Paul, Minnesota.&#160;&#160;The Reger family has a history of 
acreage acquisition in the Williston&#160;Basin dating to 1952.</font></div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">24</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Ryan R. Gilbertson </font>has served 
as our Chief Financial Officer and a Director since March 2007.&#160;&#160;Mr. 
Gilbertson&#8217;s last position prior to co-founding Northern was at Piper Jaffray in 
Minneapolis from March 2004 to August 2006.&#160;&#160;Prior to Piper Jaffray, 
Ryan was a portfolio manager at Telluride Asset Management, a multi-strategy 
hedge fund based in Wayzata, Minnesota. Ryan holds a BA from 
Gustavus&#160;Adolphus&#160;College in International 
Business/Finance.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">PART 
II</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item 
5.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Market for 
Registrant&#8217;s Common Equity, Related Stockholder Matters and Issuer Purchases of 
Equity Securities</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Market 
Information</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Our 
common stock was listed on the OTC Bulletin Board of the National Association of 
Securities Dealers (&#8220;NASD&#8221;) on January 19, 2006, under the symbol &#8220;KNTX&#8221;, but 
there was no active trading prior to approximately December 
2006.&#160;&#160;Effective April 3, 2007, after the Merger and name change, our 
trading symbol was changed to &#8220;NOGS.OB.&#8221;&#160;&#160;Our common stock commenced 
trading on the AMEX on March 26, 2008 under the symbol &#8220;NOG.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_9">The high and low bid and offer prices for shares 
of common stock of our company for each quarter during 2007 is set forth below, 
although data prior to March 2007 is not applicable to the current structure of 
the Company.&#160;&#160;The high and low sales prices for shares of common stock 
of our company for each quarter during 2008 is set forth below.&#160;&#160;The 
difference in reference price used for the tables below results from 
transitioning the listing of our common stock from the OTC Bulletin Board to the 
AMEX in the first quarter of 2008.</a></font></div>

                <tr bgcolor="#cceeff">
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="76%">

      Quarter</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Prices 
set forth above for the 2007 fiscal year were obtained from the National 
Quotation Bureau, Inc. and do not necessarily reflect actual transactions, 
retail markups, mark downs or commissions.&#160;&#160;Stock price data before 
March 20, 2007, is for the prior &#8220;shell company&#8221;&#8212;Kentex&#8212;and therefore may not be 
relevant to any analysis of the post-Merger Company.&#160;&#160;Kentex common 
stock did not commence quotation until the third quarter of fiscal year 
2006.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>The closing price for our common stock 
on the AMEX on March 13, 2008 was $2.61 per share.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Comparison 
Chart</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
following information in this Item&#160;5 of this Annual Report on Form 10-K is 
not deemed to be &#8220;soliciting material&#8221; or to be &#8220;filed&#8221; with the SEC or subject 
to Regulation&#160;14A or 14C under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 or to 
the liabilities of Section&#160;18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and 
will not be</font></div><br>

        <div id="FTR">

        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">deemed to 
be incorporated by reference into any filing under the Securities Act of 1933 or 
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, except to the extent we specifically 
incorporate it by reference into such a filing.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
following graph compares on a cumulative basis changes since completion of our 
reverse merger on April 13, 2007 in (a)&#160;the total stockholder return on our 
common stock with (b)&#160;the total return on the Standard&#160;&amp; Poor&#8217;s 
Composite 500 Index and (c)&#160;the total return on the Amex Oil 
Index.&#160;&#160;Such changes have been measured by dividing (a)&#160;the sum 
of (i)&#160;the amount of dividends for the measurement period, assuming 
dividend reinvestment, and (ii)&#160;the difference between the price per share 
at the end of and the beginning of the measurement period, by (b)&#160;the price 
per share at the beginning of the measurement period.&#160;&#160;The graph 
assumes $100 was invested on April 13, 2007 in our common stock, the 
Standard&#160;&amp; Poor&#8217;s Composite 500 Index and the Amex Oil 
Index.&#160;&#160;We have not included any graph for any period prior to April 
13, 2007, because there was no active trading in our common stock prior to April 
13, 2007 and, as such, data is not available for any period prior to such 
date.</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As of 
March 9, 2009, we had 34,120,103 shares outstanding of our common stock, held by 
approximately 437 shareholders of record.&#160;&#160;The number of record 
holders does not necessarily bear any relationship to the number of beneficial 
owners of our common stock.</font></div><br>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Dividends</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 54pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
payment of dividends is subject to the discretion of our Board of Directors and 
will depend, among other things, upon our earnings, our capital requirements, 
our financial condition, and other relevant factors.&#160;&#160;We have not paid 
or declared any dividends upon our common stock since our inception and, by 
reason of our present financial status and our contemplated financial 
requirements, and do not anticipate paying any dividends upon our common stock 
in the foreseeable future.&#160;&#160;We intend to reinvest any earnings in the 
development and expansion of our business.&#160;&#160;Any cash dividends in the 
future to common stockholders will be payable when, as and if declared by our 
Board of Directors or our Compensation Committee, based upon either the Board&#8217;s 
or the Committee&#8217;s assessment of:</font></div>

            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">prior 
      claims of preferred stock to the extent issued and outstanding; 
      and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>

be no assurance, therefore, that any dividends on the common stock will ever be 
paid.</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Recent 
Sales of Unregistered Securities; Use of Proceeds from Registered 
Securities</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On 
December 23, 2008, we issued 15,902 shares of restricted common stock to Twin 
City Technical, LLC as partial consideration for our acquisition of leases 
covering approximately 808 net mineral acres in North 
Dakota.&#160;&#160;Additionally, on December 23, 2008, we issued 7,072 shares of 
restricted common stock to Missouri River Royalty Corporation as partial 
consideration for our acquisition of leases covering approximately 130 net 
mineral acres in</font></div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">27</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; 
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">North 
Dakota.&#160;&#160;On December 23, 2008, we issued 4,465 shares of restricted 
common stock to Turmoil, LLC as partial consideration for our acquisition of 
leases covering approximately 224 net mineral acres in North 
Dakota.&#160;&#160;On December 23, 2008, we issued 500 shares of restricted 
common stock to David Bickerstaff as consideration for services provided to our 
company.&#160;&#160;All of the foregoing transactions were approved by our board 
of directors.&#160;&#160;None of the foregoing shares of our common stock were 
issued for cash consideration and, as such, we did not receive any proceed from 
the issuance of the foregoing securities.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">All of 
the foregoing shares were issued pursuant to the exemption from registration 
provided in Section 4(2) of the Act.&#160;&#160;In each instance, the recipients 
of the shares were afforded an opportunity for effective access to files and 
records of the Company that contained the relevant information needed to make 
its investment decision, including the Company&#8217;s financial statements and 
reports filed pursuant to the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;We reasonably believe 
that each recipient, immediately prior to issuing the shares, had such knowledge 
and experience in financial and business matters that it was capable of 
evaluating the merits and risks of its investment.&#160;&#160;Each recipient had 
the opportunity to speak with our officers and directors on several occasions 
prior to their investment decision.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item 
6.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Selected 
Financial Data</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The 
financial statement information set forth below is derived from our balance 
sheets as of December 31, 2008 and 2007, and the related statements of 
operations, stockholders' equity, and cash flows for the years ended December 
31, 2008 and 2007 and for the period from inception [October 5, 2006] through 
December 31, 2006 included elsewhere in this report.&#160;&#160;Financial 
statement information for the years ended December 31, 2005 and 2004 and the 
balance sheet information at December&#160;31, 2006, 2005 and 2004 are derived 
from audited financial statements presented in our December 31, 2006 Form 10-KSB 
report and not included in this report, which financial statements were the 
historical financial statements of Kentex Petroleum, Inc, our company prior to 
the acquisition of Northern on March 20, 2007.</font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item 
7.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Management&#8217;s 
Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of 
Operations</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">This 
Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of 
Operations contains forward-looking statements regarding future events and our 
future results that are subject to the safe harbors created under the Securities 
Act of 1933 (the &#8220;Securities Act&#8221;) and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the 
&#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;).&#160;&#160;All statements other than statements of historical 
facts included in this report regarding our financial position, business 
strategy, plans and objectives of management for future operations, industry 
conditions, and indebtedness covenant compliance are forward-looking 
statements.&#160;&#160;When used in this report, forward-looking statements are 
generally accompanied by terms or phrases such as &#8220;estimate,&#8221; &#8220;project,&#8221; 
&#8220;predict,&#8221; &#8220;believe,&#8221; &#8220;expect,&#8221; &#8220;anticipate,&#8221; &#8220;target,&#8221; &#8220;plan,&#8221; &#8220;intend,&#8221; 
&#8220;seek,&#8221; &#8220;goal,&#8221; &#8220;will,&#8221; &#8220;should,&#8221; &#8220;may&#8221; or other words and similar expressions 
that convey the uncertainty of future events or outcomes.&#160;&#160;Items 
contemplating or making assumptions about, actual or potential future sales, 
market size, collaborations, and trends or operating results also constitute 
such forward-looking statements.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Forward-looking 
statements involve inherent risks and uncertainties, and important factors (many 
of which are beyond our Company&#8217;s control) that could cause actual results to 
differ materially from those set forth in the forward-looking statements, 
including the following, general economic or industry conditions, nationally 
and/or in the communities in which our Company conducts business, changes in the 
interest rate environment, legislation or regulatory requirements, conditions of 
the securities markets, our ability to raise capital, changes in accounting 
principles, policies or guidelines, financial or political instability, acts of 
war or terrorism, other economic, competitive, governmental, regulatory and 
technical factors affecting our Company&#8217;s operations, products, services and 
prices.</font></div><br>

        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We have 
based these forward-looking statements on our current expectations and 
assumptions about future events.&#160;&#160;While our management considers these 
expectations and assumptions to be reasonable, they are inherently subject to 
significant business, economic, competitive, regulatory and other risks, 
contingencies and uncertainties, most of which are difficult to predict and many 
of which are beyond our control.&#160;&#160;Accordingly, results actually 
achieved may differ materially from expected results in these 
statements.&#160;&#160;Forward-looking statements speak only as of the date they 
are made.&#160;&#160;You should consider carefully the statements in this &#8220;Item 
1A. Risk Factors&#8221; and other sections of this report, which describe factors that 
could cause our actual results to differ from those set forth in the 
forward-looking statements.&#160;&#160;Our Company does not undertake, and 
specifically disclaims, any obligation to update any forward-looking statements 
to reflect events or circumstances occurring after the date of such 
statements.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Except 
as discussed below, a discussion of our past financial results is not pertinent 
to the business plan of the Company on a going forward basis, due to the change 
in our business which occurred upon consummation of the merger on March 20, 
2007.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Overview 
and Outlook</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We are an 
oil and gas exploration and production company.&#160;&#160;Our properties are 
located in Montana, North Dakota and New York.&#160;&#160;Our corporate strategy 
is to build shareholder value through the development and acquisition of oil and 
gas assets that exhibit economically producible hydrocarbons.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We 
currently control the rights to mineral leases on approximately 215,000 gross 
acres of land, 102,000 net acres of land.&#160;&#160;Our goal is to continue to 
explore for and develop hydrocarbons within the mineral leases we control as 
well as continue to expand our acreage position should opportunities present 
themselves.&#160;&#160;In order to accomplish our objectives we will need to 
achieve the following;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Continue 
      to develop our substantial inventory of high quality core Bakken acreage 
      with results consistent with those 
to-date;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Retain 
      and attract talented personnel;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">      
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#9642;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Continue 
      to be a low-cost producer of hydrocarbons; 
and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">

              </td>
              <td>      
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Continue

    acreage.</font></div>

                  <td align="left" valign="bottom">      
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Net

                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr bgcolor="#cceeff">

                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="76%">

      Expenses:</font></div>

      Expenses</font></div>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;General

                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="76%">      
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;Depletion 
      Oil and Gas Properties</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="9%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">785,504</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
